price_alert_seo_title: Stock Price Alerts - Real-Time Price Notifications & Market Updates
price_alert_seo_description: Create custom stock price alerts and get instant notifications when your target prices are hit. Track earnings, news, and price movements for your watchlist with real-time market data.
price_alert_seo_keywords: stock price alerts, price notifications, stock alerts, price targets, earnings calendar, stock news feed, real-time alerts, market notifications, stock watchlist, price monitoring
price_alert_structured_description: Real-time stock price alert system with instant notifications
price_alert_empty_description: Create price alerts for your stocks that have the most potential in your opinion.
price_alert_no_news: No news yet. Add some stocks to the price alert list to see the latest news.
price_alert_no_earnings: No earnings yet. Add some stocks to the alert list to see the latest earnings data.
price_alert_toast_select_symbols: You need to select symbols before you can delete them
